data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 2, In Carson a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Salt Lake.
In Carson Salt Lake attack through Pablo Ruiz. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jon Freemon signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
In the minute 12, Free kick Salt Lake.
Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 17, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Jon Freemon signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
Giancarlo Gonzalez scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Sebastian Lletget to set up the goal.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Free kick Salt Lake.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
LA Galaxy drives forward and Yony Gonzalez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
LA Galaxy drive upfield and Yony Gonzalez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Salt Lake defender.
In the minute 24, Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Carson.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Salt Lake.
In Carson a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Salt Lake's Pablo Ruiz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jon Freemon awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
LA Galaxy drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 38, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Jon Freemon.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, In Carson LA Galaxy drive forward through Sebastian Lletget. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 45, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 46, Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Jon Freemon awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 50, Justin Meram (Salt Lake) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 53, Salt Lake to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Jon Freemon signals a Salt Lake throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of LA Galaxy.
Justin Meram gets his shot on target but fails to score for Salt Lake.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
In the minute 56, Giancarlo Gonzalez (LA Galaxy) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
LA Galaxy make their first substitution with Rolf Feltscher replacing Yony Gonzalez.
In the minute 58, Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Salt Lake.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 60, Jon Freemon signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
The home team have replaced Jonathan Dos Santos with Joe Corona. This is the second substitution made today by Guillermo Schelotto.
In the minute 62, In Carson, Donny Toia of Salt Lake is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 64, Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
LA Galaxy take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Cristian Pavon.
That's a fine assist from Emiliano Insua.
In the minute 67, Jon Freemon signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Ethan Zubak (LA Galaxy) has received a yellow card from Jon Freemon.
In the minute 69, Damir Kreilach for Salt Lake drives towards goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cristian Pavon's header is off-target for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 70, Jon Freemon awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Salt Lake are pushing forward but Pablo Ruiz's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In the minute 72, Freddy Juarez (Salt Lake) is making a first substitution, with Douglas Martinez replacing Everton Luiz.
Maikel Chang is replacing Donny Toia for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 74, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Jon Freemon signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to LA Galaxy's area.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Douglas Martinez (Salt Lake) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Justin Meram with an assist there.
In the minute 83, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Sacha Kljestan is replacing Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 84, Jon Freemon awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Salt Lake.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Salt Lake to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Salt Lake are caught offside.
At Dignity Health Sports Park the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Salt Lake.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
